Detailed Description

template<typename FunctionType>
class triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >

Standard matrix/det manipulations used in several QMC.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename FunctionType >
triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::det_manip ( FunctionType  F,
size_t  init_size 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
FThe function (NB : a copy is made of the F object in this class).
init_sizeThe maximum size of the matrix before a resize (like reserve in std::vector). Like std::vector, resize is automatic (by a factor 2) but can yield a performance penalty if it happens too often.

References triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::reserve().

template<typename FunctionType >
void triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::complete_operation ( ) [inline]

Finish the move of the last try_xxx called. Throws if no try_xxx has been done or if the last operation was complete_operation.

template<typename FunctionType >
void triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::reserve ( size_t  new_size) [inline]

Like for std::vector, reserve memory for a bigger size. Preserves only the matrix, not the temporary working vectors/matrices, so do NOT use it between a try_XXX and acomplete_operation

Referenced by triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::det_manip(), triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_insert(), and triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_insert2().

template<typename FunctionType >
int triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::roll_matrix ( RollDirection  roll) [inline]

"Cyclic Rolling" of the determinant.

Right : Move the Nth col to the first col cyclically. Left : Move the first col to the Nth, cyclically. Up : Move the first row to the Nth, cyclically. Down : Move the Nth row to the first row cyclically.

Returns -1 is the roll changes the sign of the det, 1 otherwise NB : this routine is not a try_xxx : it DOES make the modification and does not need to be completed... WHY is it like this ???? : try_roll : return det +1/-1.

template<typename FunctionType >
value_type triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_change_col ( size_t  j,
xy_type const &  y 
) [inline]

Consider the change the column j and the corresponding y.

Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv. This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().

template<typename FunctionType >
value_type triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_change_row ( size_t  i,
xy_type const &  x 
) [inline]

Consider the change the row i and the corresponding x.

Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv. This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().

template<typename FunctionType >
value_type triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_insert ( size_t  i,
size_t  j,
xy_type const &  x,
xy_type const &  y 
) [inline]

Insert operation at colum j0 and row i0.

The operation consists in adding :

* a column f(x_i, y_{j0}) * and a row f(x_{i0}, x_j)

The new colum/row will be at col j0, row i0.

0 <= i0,j0 <= N, where N is the current size of the matrix. The current column j0 (resp. row i0) will become column j0+1 (resp. row i0+1). Inserting at N simply add the new col at the end.

Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv.

This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().

References triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::reserve().

template<typename FunctionType >
value_type triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_insert2 ( size_t  i0,
size_t  i1,
size_t  j0,
size_t  j1,
xy_type const &  x0,
xy_type const &  x1,
xy_type const &  y0,
xy_type const &  y1 
) [inline]

Double Insert operation at colum j0,j1 and row i0,i1.

The operation consists in adding : * a column f(x_i, y_{j0}) * and a row f(x_{i0}, x_j) The new colum/row will be at col j0, row i0.

0 <= i0,i1,j0,j1 <= N+1, where N is the current size of the matrix. Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv. This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().

References triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::reserve().

value_type triqs::det_manip::det_manip< FunctionType >::try_remove ( size_t  i,
size_t  j 
) [inline]

Consider the removal the colj0 and row i0 from the matrix.

Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv. This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().

Returns the ratio of det Minv_new / det Minv. This routine does NOT make any modification. It has to be completed with complete_operation().
